languages.text: "Наверняка. Скорее всего, в этом мои бывшие коллеги, рано или поздно, преуспеют". {n}Хейнрикс криво улыбается.{/n} "Я не рассчитывал бы на то, что они отступятся от цели уничтожить предателя — я бы не отступился. Но тебе не о чем волноваться — я сделаю все возможное, чтобы, когда за мной придут, ты не пострадала".

"Undoubtedly. And it is likely that my former colleagues will succeed in that purpose, sooner or later." {n}Heinrix smiles crookedly.{/n} "Don't count on them losing interest in destroying a traitor — I know I wouldn't give up. But you have nothing to worry about — I will do everything I can to ensure that when they come for me, you will not be harmed."
languages.original_text: "Наверняка. Скорее всего, в этом мои бывшие коллеги, рано или поздно, преуспеют". {n}Хейнрикс криво улыбается.{/n} "Я не рассчитывал бы на то, что они отступятся от цели уничтожить предателя — я бы не отступился. Но тебе не о чем волноваться — я сделаю все возможное, чтобы, когда за мной придут, ты не пострадала".

traits.locale_text: "Undoubtedly. And it is likely that my former colleagues will succeed in that purpose, sooner or later." {n}Heinrix smiles crookedly.{/n} "Don't count on them losing interest in destroying a traitor — I know I wouldn't give up. But you have nothing to worry about — I will do everything I can to ensure that when they come for me, you will not be harmed."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

And it is likely that my former colleagues will succeed in that purpose, sooner or later." {n}Heinrix smiles crookedly.{/n} "Don't count on them losing interest in destroying a traitor — I know I wouldn't give up. But you have nothing to worry about — I will do everything I can to ensure that when they come for me, you will not be harmed."

But you have nothing to worry about — I will do everything I can to ensure that when they come for me, you will not be harmed."

traits.locale_text: "Undoubtedly. And it is likely that my former colleagues will succeed in that purpose, sooner or later." {n}Heinrix smiles crookedly.{/n} "Don't count on them losing interest in destroying a traitor — I know I wouldn't give up. But you have nothing to worry about — I will do everything I can to ensure that when they come for me, you will not be harmed."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Sin duda. Y es muy probable que mis antiguos colegas tengan éxito en su empeño, tarde o temprano». {n}Heinrix esboza una sonrisa maliciosa.{/n} «No contemos con que pierdan el interés por eliminar a un traidor; sé bien que jamás se rendirán. Pero no tiene por qué preocuparse: haré todo lo que pueda para asegurarme de que no le ponen un dedo encima cuando vengan a por mí».
languages.original_text: "Undoubtedly. And it is likely that my former colleagues will succeed in that purpose, sooner or later." {n}Heinrix smiles crookedly.{/n} "Don't count on them losing interest in destroying a traitor — I know I wouldn't give up. But you have nothing to worry about — I will do everything I can to ensure that when they come for me, you will not be harmed."

traits.locale_text: «Sin duda. Y es muy probable que mis antiguos colegas tengan éxito en su empeño, tarde o temprano». {n}Heinrix esboza una sonrisa maliciosa.{/n} «No contemos con que pierdan el interés por eliminar a un traidor; sé bien que jamás se rendirán. Pero no tiene por qué preocuparse: haré todo lo que pueda para asegurarme de que no le ponen un dedo encima cuando vengan a por mí».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「当然そうなるだろう。遅かれ早かれ、元同僚がその任務を負うことになると思う」{n}ハインリックスはいびつな笑顔を見せた。{/n}「相手が誰であろうと、彼らは裏切り者は容赦しない…俺だってそうする。でも、心配する必要はない。俺を始末しに来たときは、あなたが傷つけられないように俺は全力を尽くす」
languages.original_text: "Undoubtedly. And it is likely that my former colleagues will succeed in that purpose, sooner or later." {n}Heinrix smiles crookedly.{/n} "Don't count on them losing interest in destroying a traitor — I know I wouldn't give up. But you have nothing to worry about — I will do everything I can to ensure that when they come for me, you will not be harmed."

traits.locale_text: 「当然そうなるだろう。遅かれ早かれ、元同僚がその任務を負うことになると思う」{n}ハインリックスはいびつな笑顔を見せた。{/n}「相手が誰であろうと、彼らは裏切り者は容赦しない…俺だってそうする。でも、心配する必要はない。俺を始末しに来たときは、あなたが傷つけられないように俺は全力を尽くす」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “毫无疑问，当然会。而且，我曾经的同事们很可能迟早会实现这个目标。”{n}海因里希苦笑道。{/n}“别指望他们会对消灭叛徒失去兴趣，若换做是我，恐怕我也不会放弃。不过，你不用担心。我会尽我所能，确保他们来找我的时候，你不会受到伤害。”
languages.original_text: "Undoubtedly. And it is likely that my former colleagues will succeed in that purpose, sooner or later." {n}Heinrix smiles crookedly.{/n} "Don't count on them losing interest in destroying a traitor — I know I wouldn't give up. But you have nothing to worry about — I will do everything I can to ensure that when they come for me, you will not be harmed."

traits.locale_text: “毫无疑问，当然会。而且，我曾经的同事们很可能迟早会实现这个目标。”{n}海因里希苦笑道。{/n}“别指望他们会对消灭叛徒失去兴趣，若换做是我，恐怕我也不会放弃。不过，你不用担心。我会尽我所能，确保他们来找我的时候，你不会受到伤害。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Sans aucun doute, et il est probable que mes anciens collègues y parviennent tôt ou tard, {n}dit-il avec un sourire en coin.{/n} N'espérez pas qu'ils finissent par se désintéresser d'un traître ; je sais que je n'en ferais rien. Quoi qu'il en soit, vous n'avez rien à craindre. Je ferai tout ce qui est en mon pouvoir pour éviter qu'ils vous nuisent lorsqu'ils décideront de me faire payer ma décision. »
languages.original_text: "Undoubtedly. And it is likely that my former colleagues will succeed in that purpose, sooner or later." {n}Heinrix smiles crookedly.{/n} "Don't count on them losing interest in destroying a traitor — I know I wouldn't give up. But you have nothing to worry about — I will do everything I can to ensure that when they come for me, you will not be harmed."

traits.locale_text: « Sans aucun doute, et il est probable que mes anciens collègues y parviennent tôt ou tard, {n}dit-il avec un sourire en coin.{/n} N'espérez pas qu'ils finissent par se désintéresser d'un traître ; je sais que je n'en ferais rien. Quoi qu'il en soit, vous n'avez rien à craindre. Je ferai tout ce qui est en mon pouvoir pour éviter qu'ils vous nuisent lorsqu'ils décideront de me faire payer ma décision. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Zweifellos. Und meine ehemaligen Kollegen werden früher oder später Erfolg haben." {n}Heinrix grinst schief.{/n} "Rechnet lieber nicht damit, dass sie das Interesse an der Jagd auf einen Verräter verlieren. Ich jedenfalls würde nicht aufgeben. Doch Ihr habt keinen Grund zur Sorge. Ich werde dafür sorgen, dass Euch nichts geschieht, wenn sie mich holen kommen."
languages.original_text: "Undoubtedly. And it is likely that my former colleagues will succeed in that purpose, sooner or later." {n}Heinrix smiles crookedly.{/n} "Don't count on them losing interest in destroying a traitor — I know I wouldn't give up. But you have nothing to worry about — I will do everything I can to ensure that when they come for me, you will not be harmed."

traits.locale_text: "Zweifellos. Und meine ehemaligen Kollegen werden früher oder später Erfolg haben." {n}Heinrix grinst schief.{/n} "Rechnet lieber nicht damit, dass sie das Interesse an der Jagd auf einen Verräter verlieren. Ich jedenfalls würde nicht aufgeben. Doch Ihr habt keinen Grund zur Sorge. Ich werde dafür sorgen, dass Euch nichts geschieht, wenn sie mich holen kommen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Undoubtedly. And it is likely that my former colleagues will succeed in that purpose, sooner or later." {n}Heinrix smiles crookedly.{/n} "Don't count on them losing interest in destroying a traitor — I know I wouldn't give up. But you have nothing to worry about — I will do everything I can to ensure that when they come for me, you will not be harmed."

languages.text: "Şüphesiz. Eski yoldaşlarım peşime düşecek, er ya da geç bulacaktır da." {n}Heinrix hınzırca gülümsüyor.{/n} "Haini infaz etme fırsatı ellerine geçmiş, teperler mi hiç?.. Ben olsam tepmezdim. Ancak merak etme, senlik bir durum yok. Bana geldiklerinde... Sana bir şey olmaması için elimden geleni yapacağım."
languages.original_text: "Undoubtedly. And it is likely that my former colleagues will succeed in that purpose, sooner or later." {n}Heinrix smiles crookedly.{/n} "Don't count on them losing interest in destroying a traitor — I know I wouldn't give up. But you have nothing to worry about — I will do everything I can to ensure that when they come for me, you will not be harmed."

Ben olsam tepmezdim. Ancak merak etme, senlik bir durum yok. Bana geldiklerinde... Sana bir şey olmaması için elimden geleni yapacağım."
